thread.title: Martin Alex Powichrowski
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Martin Alex Powichrowski

author: Martin Alex Powichrowski
title: Martin Alex Powichrowski
text:
As the title says - great customer services. David was so helpful and professional. Although my car had to stay overnight in the garage due to ordered parts, he has done everything to make a pick up the next day as early as possible.
I will definitely recommend Servicing Stop to my friends and family.
